Articles.Content:
From the wiki:

> 
> [Dres] has not "cleared its neighborhood", due to the presence of "Dres-teroids" nearby. However, the "Dres-troids" are actually in orbit around Dres, by definition, making them part of a ring system.

There are no asteroids orbiting Dres in any of my games, and no asteroids anywhere other then where they have been since the ARM update. What is it talking about?
I've heard that they won't spawn until you visit dres, i.e. get a ship in orbit there

If you're playing career, you'll have to fully upgrade your tracking station to see them. When I went out to Dres last I did have one pop up on in the orbital map but I couldn't make out any 'ring' structure there. They are out there!
I see them there in sandbox mode, they look just like the ones near Kerbin's SoI.

> 
> I see them there in sandbox mode, they look just like the ones near Kerbin's SoI.

Are they always in orbit or dres, or are some doing flybys like the ones near kerbin?

Always in circular zero-inclined orbits between ~18 and ~20.5 Mm. They form a ring.

![6Q07Sdg.png](http://i.imgur.com/6Q07Sdg.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-31T11:40:53Z" title="05/31/2015 11:40  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 31, 2015</time> by Teilnehmer**
That picture just made me 5000% more hyped to visit Dres ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)

> 
> That picture just made me 5000% more hyped to visit Dres ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)

Same. I have a mothership with a miner heading there, with 12 Kerbals onboard and not enough fuel to return. Now I know they won't have to drift there until TAC-LS run out.
It would be cool to implement Main Belt asteroids into stock game, as well as Kuiper belt objdects, comets and moonlets of Jool ...
Ok... now I have a reason to visit Dres. To Dres!

Nice. Changing Dres from a far-flung rock into a cluster of far-flung rocks (no sarcasm intended) sounds pretty awesome. I wanna go ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
I have no asteroids there and i have a probe there. Does it have to be a manned ship? Sandbox by the way...

Dres, the fuel stop of the solar system. Many pumps to choose from.

BYO Snacks
Dres. That damn inclination. I never have enough fuel left to return! ![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif)

> 
> From the wiki:
> There are no asteroids orbiting Dres in any of my games, and no asteroids anywhere other then where they have been since the ARM update. What is it talking about?

I actually saw a video recently where a guy named Astrogamer727 was landing on Dres and when he was time warping there, he saw the rings. The might have been 6 astroids, and both me and him were very surprised. (First peek!)

> 
> It would be cool to implement Main Belt asteroids into stock game, as well as Kuiper belt objdects, comets and moonlets of Jool ...

There WAS a mod that made that. Not sure it it was using a plugin to make the spawn algorigthm configurable or whether that is a function of the stock game. In the case of the latter, adding some stuff to the spawn .cfg does it. In the case of the former, the plugin will need to be updated to 1.0.x and I doubt it will be as simple as a recompile.

EDIT: [I found it.](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/76402-Plugin-WIP-0-23-5-Custom-Asteroids-0-2-1)

> 
> That picture just made me 5000% more hyped to visit Dres ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)

Hype level increased to:

.1 percent

Yeah... Hype was already pretty low to start off with...

I want to see roids around Jool, now... Would be cool.
